alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mission Valley, or 11 miles west of Victoria, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Goliad, Fannin, Schroeder, Coleto Creek Park, Saxet Lakes, Ander, Oak Village, Mission Valley, Nursery and Victoria Riverside Park. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 632 and 646. US Highway 59 between mile markers 640 and 672. US Highway 77 between mile markers 580 and 594. US Highway 87 between mile markers 798 and 804. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
